channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for GA
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for GA

item.title: Report E-2025010243
item.description:
Report E-2025010243

Identified by scraper @ 2025-01-23T21:13:01+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-01-16
  • City: ELLENWOOD
  • State: GA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: R & L CARRIERS, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 4000
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: On January 16, 2025, one (1) 5-liter jug of UN3149 was punctured and released approximately less than one (<1) gallon of product to the trailer floor. R+L Carriers retained Cura Emergency Services, LC who dispatched a crew from Hull's Environmental Services (HES) to remediate the impacted site. The crew utilized cleaners, absorbents, and hand tools to remediate the site. All impacted materials were containerized in two (2) 5-gallon pails for disposal.
